oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Big Jeff And The Radio Playboys - WLAC show - 1948-08-23 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of a Big Jeff and the Radio Playboys broadcast for WLAC, Nashville, TN. Broadcast Tuesday August 23, 1949 at 6:00 am (CST). Featuring Charlie (host), Big Jeff Bess (host, performer), Dopey (control-man, performer), and band members Bill Martin (bass), Speedy (possibly Speedy Grissom, fiddle), and Herman (possibly Herman Coleman).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Big Jeff Bess; Radio Playboys
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Announcer opening statement -- Theme (Wanderers (My Lop-Eared Mule, My Broken Down Horse 'N' Me)) -- Opening statement (Charlie, Big Jeff) -- Green Light -- Big Jeff talks -- Give Me Roses While I Live -- Big Jeff introduces Dopey -- Lovesick Blues -- Big Jeff and Herman talk
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WLAC (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Bess, Jeff, 1920-1998; Radio Playboys (Musical group);
